category_redirect-change-category:
Used as comment. Parameters:
* %(oldCatLink)s - old category name
* %(oldCatTitle)s - old category name
* %(newCatLink)s - new category name
* %(newCatTitle)s - new category name
category_redirect-comment: Edit summary for maintenance notice of new redirects created.
category_redirect-edit-request:
Variables:
* %(itemlists)s - list of edit requests (pages). Uses the message {{msg-pywikibot|Category redirect-edit-request-item}}.
category_redirect-edit-request-item: Used as %(itemlist)s in {{msg-pywikibot|Category_redirect-edit-request}}. Variables: * %(title)s - page title * %(oldcat)s - old category name * %(newcat)s - new category name
category_redirect-fix-double: Edit summary when the bot fixes double category redirects.
